mapper.insert: INSERT INTO aop_user ( userId, userPw, userNickName, userAge, userPhone, userAddress ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userNickName}, #{userAge}, #{userPhone}, #{userAddress} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(userId) AS RESULT FROM aop_user WHERE userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE aop_user SET authority = #{authority} WHERE userId = #{userId} AND enabled = '1'
